title: A Cyclist's Brave Journey After a Big Crash
summary: Vicky Williamson was a cyclist from Great Britain who dreamed of going to the Olympics. In 2016, she had a terrible crash that hurt her neck, back, and pelvis. She was lucky not to be paralyzed. After the crash, she had to have surgery and spent weeks in the hospital. She worked very hard to get better and even returned to sports in different ways. Now, she has decided to stop competing and start a new life. She feels sad because cycling was a big part of who she was, and she is figuring out what to do next. She talks about the good and bad times in her journey.

background_read: Vicky Williamson is a former cyclist from Great Britain who was training for the Olympics. In 2016, she had a serious crash that caused bad injuries. She had to have surgery and recover in the hospital. Even though it was hard, she returned to sports but later decided to retire. This story helps us learn about how athletes can face big challenges and change their lives.
